A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dissatisfying. Most of the movie just leaves you asking \"Why?\"\, not out curiosity\, but because there is literally no point to the events. It's like someone just picked out some cool concept art and strung it together without a purpose. But hey there was some cool lightsaber fights and the porgs were actually cute and funny. So 1/2 star for that. Can't wait to see porgs with lightsabers in Johnson's new trilogy.
